details:
verb
- place limits on (extent or access)
= synonyms: bound
- hold back
= synonyms: constrain, hold back, encumber, cumber, withhold, keep back, conceal, hold in
- to close within bounds, limit or hold back from movement
= synonyms: hold
- to compel or deter by or as if by threats
= synonyms: intimidate
- keep under control
= synonyms: keep
